text.text: 1：這 3 個槽是你放入你想要融化的東西的地方。 它可能是礦石、金屬錠或其他任何您想嘗試熔化的東西！
2：這是熔融材料將顯示的地方。請記住，熔化爐中一次只能有一種熔化的材料。

3: This is where your fuel shows. If you have a heater it will appear as shown and you will be able to insert any item that can be used as fuel. If you have a seared tank it will show a bar with liquid fuel in it.
